title: Discover Sweden
creator_credit: Dag Bengtsson, D Tranword Communications, J and Journal Films
brief_description: Provides a general introduction to the social geography of Sweden. Presents visual and factual information on landscape, industries, transport and settlement, banking systems, politics, and education. Focuses on the country’s people describing the sports they enjoy, their religion and social customs. Useful for regional studies of Europe. Suitable for lower and middle secondary levels.
